Introduction

XENEX is a four-member boy group under Beast Mode Label. They made their official debut on February 26, 2020 with the digital single, "It's Gonna Hurt."

Originally debuting as a five-member group, members Bon and Uhyeong left in November of 2021. Shortly after, member Heeseok was added to the group.
